thread.title: Carahsoft Ranked Fourth Largest Private Company in DC by Washington Business Journal
thread.title_full: Carahsoft Ranked Fourth Largest Private Company in DC by Washington Business Journal - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Carahsoft Ranked Fourth Largest Private Company in DC by Washington Business Journal
text:
Ninth Consecutive Year Carahsoft Included in Washington's 100 Largest Private Companies
 RESTON, VA, October 06, Carahsoft Technology Corp. , the trusted government IT solutions provider, announced today that it has been named one of Washington D.C.'s largest private companies by the Washington Business Journal. The list recognizes metro-DC's top 100 privately held companies ranked by 2014 revenue.
In 2014, Carahsoft's revenue exceeded $2.28B, earning it the #4 rank on this year's list, and making the 500-employee company the top-performing government contractor. Carahsoft made its first appearance on the 2007 list at #89 based on 2006 revenue of $91.9 million--just two years after the company was founded. It has risen quickly in the ranking over the past nine years.
"We are honored to be included among the region's fastest growing companies and to contribute to the vitality of our local economy," said Craig P. Abod, Carahsoft president. "The government's demand for our best-of-breed IT solutions and the continued support of our customers, partners, resellers and team members continues to fuel our growth."
This year, Carahsoft was also recognized by Washington Business Journal as a Top Government Contractor for the fifth consecutive year.
Founded in 2004, Carahsoft serves as the largest government partner for many of the industry's leading IT manufacturers including VMware, Adobe, Symantec, Red Hat, HP, SAP, EMC, and F5 Networks among others. Carahsoft and its partners focus on providing technology that helps public sector customers solve IT security, management and infrastructure challenges and improve IT efficiencies and capabilities. Carahsoft posted more than $2.2 billion in revenue in 2014, and employs more than 500 team members.
About Carahsoft
Carahsoft Technology Corp. is the trusted Government IT solutions provider. As a top-ranked GSA Schedule Contract holder, Carahsoft serves as the master government aggregator for many of its best-of-breed technology vendors, supporting an extensive ecosystem of software manufacturers, value-added resellers, system integrators, and consulting partners committed to helping government agencies select and implement the best solution at the best possible value.
The company's dedicated Solutions Divisions proactively market, sell and deliver VMware, Adobe, Symantec, EMC, F5 Networks, Open Source, HP, SAP, and Innovative and Intelligence products and services, among others. Carahsoft is consistently recognized by its partners as a top revenue producer, and is listed annually among the industry's fastest growing firms by CRN, Inc., Washington Technology, The Washington Post, Washington Business Journal, and SmartCEO. Visit us at www.carahsoft.com .
